author: Julia Hollingsworth, CNN
title: A coronavirus test can be developed in 24 hours. So why are some countries still struggling to diagnose?
description: One German scientist created a coronavirus test in January to give countries outside China a head start on the battle against the virus. Three months later, many have squandered that opportunity.
content:
January 5: China announces that the unknown pneumonia cases in Wuhan are not SARS or MERS.
January 7: Chinese authorities confirm that they have identified the virus as a novel coronavirus, initially named 2019-nCoV by the WHO.
